sense.def:
A conference
je sestanek, na katerem potekajo uradni pogovori.

seg.quote: The Managing Director has daily conferences with the other staff members.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in conference
, je na uradnem sestanku.

seg.quote: ...the time he must spend in conference listening to reports.

sense.def:
A conference
je tudi sestanek, na katerem ljudje razpravljajo o določeni témi in pogosto traja več dni.
